name: The Adventures of B E A N
name_original: The Adventures of B E A N
description: Ok so i just started working on developing games and this is my first test project. its called the adventures of bean because the character model is a bean. WASD to move, Space to jump, and C to crouch/slide. it has a small basic map and will be updated. It will eventually hopefully become a 3d platformer if all turns out well. Have fun playing! I also made a website for it and heres the link: https://sites.google.com/view/theadventuresofbean.
